ComicInfo.Summary:
Skye has rounded up nearly all the escapees from the Dark Book. Now, with the help of her friends, and the end nearly in sight, she is ready to take down the last one! Don’t miss this action-packed issue as Skye’s new journey draws closer to her endgame!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Geebo Vigonte & Ula Mos | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Keith Garvey | 3 | D | Cover D | Martin Coccolo & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | 2021 July VIP Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Dawn McTeigue | Missing | F | 2021 July Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Dawn McTeigue | Missing | G | 2021 June Livestream Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Ian MacDonald | Missing | H | 2021 June Livestream Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Ian MacDonald | Missing | I | 2021 June Livestream Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Sun Khamunaki | Missing | J | 2021 July Livestream Roadrunner Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover 1 of 2, Limited to 350 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | K | 2021 July Livestream Roadrunner Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover 1 of 2, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | L | 2021 July Livestream Wraparound Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | M | 2021 July Livestream Wraparound Cosplay Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 25 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
